  • DisplayList

Class DisplayList

Displays a set of DisplayObject(s)}, which show the state of the simulation. A DisplayObject typically represents a SimObject, but not always.

zzIndex

DisplayObjects with a lower zIndex appear underneath those with higher zIndex. The DisplayList is sorted by zIndex.

    • DisplayList

Methods

add

  • add(dispObj: DisplayObject): void
    • Defined in davinci-newton/view/DisplayList.ts:61

    Adds the DisplayObject, inserting it at the end of the group of DisplayObjects with the same zIndex; the item will appear visually over objects that have the same (or lower) zIndex.

    Parameters

    • dispObj: DisplayObject

      the DisplayObject to add

    Returns void

draw

  • draw(context: CanvasRenderingContext2D, coordMap: CoordMap): void
    • Defined in davinci-newton/view/DisplayList.ts:86

    Draws the DisplayObjects in order, which means that DisplayObjects drawn later (at the end of the list) will appear to be on top of those drawn earlier (at start of the list).

    Parameters

    • context: CanvasRenderingContext2D

      the canvas's context to draw this object into

    • coordMap: CoordMap

    Returns void
